website_summaries.verdict: The New Balance 669 v2 is a casual walking shoe whose design comes rather close to hiking footwear. While not as heavy-duty as the latter, this trainer is comfortable enough for everyday walks on urban pavements and forest trails.
pros: The majority of wearers find the 699 v2 from New Balance to be comfortable
Many buyers appreciated the austere colors and design which make the shoe appropriate for various occasions
The trainer is quite easy to put on and take off, according to some reviews
A few comments state that it offers ample quality at a moderate price
Multiple wearers have enjoyed the shoe’s cushioning
A person with plantar fasciitis also finds it suitable for their foot condition
cons: A couple of buyers note that the stretchy lace loops take some getting used to
Several purchasers resorted to adding a custom insert to receive the needed underfoot support

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable, good quality shoe
customer_reviews.text: Finally! 7 pairs of shoes later, I finally found a pair that fit. These are really nice, good quality shoes. The shoe laces are a little too short in my opinion, but they tie, so it's all good. I like the comfort insoles. They're very, well, comfy! And there's plenty of room for my toes; even the little guys are happy! 😁
customer_reviews.author: Ironic Logic

customer_reviews.title: This is a WOMEN'S shoe
customer_reviews.text: Was very happy that this was a WOMEN'S shoe. I am totally pleased with the fit. I was Leary in ordering due to the mix up in description BUT after looking at the reviews and reading that everyone got a woman's shoe, I bought and am glad I did.
customer_reviews.author: dolle

customer_reviews.title: This was ok.
customer_reviews.text: This was a womens sneaker. Ordered 9.5 then returned for 10. Decent sneaker for the sale price but not full price. For some reason my big toe is pushed up. Hmmm. This sneaker is not as cushiony as other pairs I have but on the plus you can insert a better insole. Will buy another at the sale price and an insole.
customer_reviews.author: jessica seeloff

customer_reviews.title: Definitely women's shoes
customer_reviews.text: The box label shows that it's a woman's shoe, and I got the size I wear in women's (size 10) and it fits perfectly. Will update review after I've worked in them awhile. Appearance-wise, they look like the display pic, but in that pic they look like they might be a mid top shoe, but they are low tops.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda W.

customer_reviews.title: Make sure you get what you order
customer_reviews.text: Ordered a men’s shoe got sent a women’s shoe. Not cool. Shoe is to small husband wore them to work and noticed the smallness. Didn’t return due to him wearing them
customer_reviews.author: Christy Hupp

customer_reviews.title: Wide toe box
customer_reviews.text: I am a huge NB fan for their ankle stability. Originally, I ordered one size up and wide, I’m normally a size seven, but need orthodics for a high arch. i also have a wide toe box, so almost all woman’s sneakers are uncomfortable. The wide was WAY too wide and gave me absolutely no ankle support. I reordered my normal size 7 with normal width and they fit perfectly in the width toebox and ankle, but low and behold i need one size up 7.5. I guess i hit that mark in my 40+ yrs where i have hone ip in shoe size. Finally a sneaker with a wide toe box!!
customer_reviews.author: KAM

customer_reviews.title: Sent Wrong Size
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a 9.5W and received a size 10. The box was not an original and didn't have indication of size or make etc. Strings were hanging over the side of the right insole. And, measuring them against my old 659 pair, they are at least an inch taller and much heavier. Other than that, I loved them. Not. Returning
customer_reviews.author: Polly Runnels

customer_reviews.title: Misleading advertisement.
customer_reviews.text: The item was advertised as Mens shoe not women, I purchased a Mens size 8 which in fact it's a women's 8 which is too small. Advertisement misleading. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Hazel Bonner

customer_reviews.title: These are women's!
customer_reviews.text: Regardless of the headline of the ad, these are women's sizes, and run very small. I really like them. Aggressive tread, awesome traction. Love them, and would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Anschuetz

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THESE - BUT THEY ARE WOMENS
customer_reviews.text: As stated in previous reviews.... These are women's shoes - even though they are described as mens. That being said - I LOVE THEM! They are very comfy and I have hard feet to fit. And at such a bargain!! They are $50 more at Famous Footwear!!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Curtis

customer_reviews.title: New Balance never lets me down!
customer_reviews.text: New Balance is the only athletic shoe I've worn consistently as an adult. I desperately needed a new shoe to handle the extra quarantine walking but I didn't want to spend a lot of money. I had no qualms about ordering them online (a first for me) because I knew the fit would be good once my feet got used to them. After 6 long walks (2-4 miles) the shoe is getting more comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoes
customer_reviews.text: I was already a fan of New Balance anyway, so I am not at all shocked that I love these shoes. They are super comfortable and I love the colors on this particular pair. Would definitely recommend this brand for anyone searching for comfortable quality shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa P

customer_reviews.title: Looks Exactly As Pictured!
customer_reviews.text: Wide Fitted shoes that I got for Fall/Winter walking down the road, in the woods, etc. Looks exactly as pictured, seems comfortable with socks to wear thus far!
customer_reviews.author: Bran S. H.

customer_reviews.title: Most comfortable shoes for being on my feet all day!
customer_reviews.text: First of all, the price was amazing - only ~ $25.00! Second, I love the colors and they match my black and pewter scrubs perfectly. Finally, OMG comfortable as hell!
customer_reviews.author: Elise T

customer_reviews.title: They fit perfect!
customer_reviews.text: These tennis shoes are very pretty, and they are true to size so they fit perfect, and they're very comfortable, the material is very good quality, I'm very happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: Kathia

customer_reviews.title: Woman's New Balance Sneakers
customer_reviews.text: Loved the look but too small. Will order larger size. Ordered a larger size but still too small. Returned will not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No arch support
customer_reviews.text: I loved these shoes so much but had to return them as they had zero arch support. Ugh, I'm so bummed because otherwise they were perfect.
customer_reviews.author: "prissyqods"

customer_reviews.title: Women's shoe
customer_reviews.text: These were labeled as "men's shoes" however the box says women's and the the plastic parts are pink.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Too stiff and rigid for my feet.
customer_reviews.text: This is a very stiff shoe, and has a heavy rigid feel. Not what I expected. Wouldn’t recommend for all day wear.
customer_reviews.author: j. b. quillen

customer_reviews.title: Good fit
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable and good fit. The only thing I don't like is the material the laces are made of causes the shoes to not stay tied. Even double knotted, they come untied.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The web page list the shoe as men's the actual shoe that arrived is women's
customer_reviews.text: The web page indicated this is a Men's Shoe. The shoes that arrived are women's shoes. I have returned the women's shoes. Correct the web page description.
customer_reviews.author: Robert D. Mccoy

customer_reviews.title: As always with a walking shoe, order a half size larger than your normal dress shoe.
customer_reviews.text: I walk 2.5 miles a day and need good support. This shoe fits the bill.
customer_reviews.author: C A Stone

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable shoes!
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable shoes. I have to wear good supportive shoes and these shoes fit the bill.😊
customer_reviews.author: Countrygirl

customer_reviews.title: i liked product
customer_reviews.text: I order the shoes for the gym and I am glad they fit a like large as I hope for.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I ordered a 1/2 size per  reviews.- So ,I have extra room for the toes to move around when walking.
customer_reviews.text: Shoelaces are too short when you lace them to the top eyelets.I bought them to walk along the college track. They felt comfortable for the first time going around the track.
customer_reviews.author: ferrer

customer_reviews.title: It is a nice shoes
customer_reviews.text: Hi order a 8.5 I got a size 7 but I love this tennis shoes
customer_reviews.author: Princess Newman

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable shoes!
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves the look and feel of these shoes!
customer_reviews.author: William Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Best New Balance for standing/walking on concrete.
customer_reviews.text: I like the fit/comfort of these shoes. I wear them for my job where I stand/walk all day.
customer_reviews.author: Sonja Cole

customer_reviews.title: color is great
customer_reviews.text: Very impressed by the color and style and size fit perfect
customer_reviews.author: Amy Oliver

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable walking shoes
customer_reviews.text: I am a nurse an am on my feet all day. These shoes are super comfortable. I also wear show inserts. The inside cushions come out so you can insert custom insoles. They hold up very well! I get at least 1.5-2 yes out of these shoes. Highly recommend them- great walking shoes too.
customer_reviews.author: Step

customer_reviews.title: Good for people who wear orthodics
customer_reviews.text: The sizing is comparable to other New Balance shoes. I like that I can remove the inlays, insert my own orthodics.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy W.

customer_reviews.title: Fabric is not durable
customer_reviews.text: After only having these shoes for 4 months, the material on the top broke through. I liked the fit, style and very comfortable, but are not very durable.
customer_reviews.author: Zeni Pradel

customer_reviews.title: Very uncomfortable. Is not good for walking.
customer_reviews.text: This is my third pair of New Balance. This shoe is very uncomfortable. I am very pleased with the other two purchases.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Nice look but uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: Love how they look but something inside the shoe is rubbing against my little toe so can’t work in them which is what I got them for
customer_reviews.author: Jm

customer_reviews.title: returned
customer_reviews.text: The sneakers purchased did not fit right and where very uncomfortable
customer_reviews.author: Marlene Schmitt

customer_reviews.title: Woman’s shoe
customer_reviews.text: I bought these shoes at a New Balance sale at the store in Skowhegan, so I was able to see and try them on directly at the source. That being said, I have multiple leg, knee, and back issues, and I am constantly on the search for shoes I can wear at my job which requires me to be on my feet much of the day. These shoes, once broken in, are perfect for me. I love them and wear them constantly. Going too get another pair soon so I can trade them off,
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: The most..
customer_reviews.text: Uncomfortable sneaker I have ever bought!! No cushion at the ball of your foot!!
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Not men's shoes
customer_reviews.text: The main page for this item says men's but they're actually women's shoes, and it shows up as women's when you have it in your cart. I accidentally ordered them thinking they were mens so they are way too small.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Wrong description for New Balance shoes.
customer_reviews.text: The New balance 669v2 cushion running shoes is described for men (size 9.5=275 mm) in the Amazon website, but delivered shoes was for women (size 9.5=265 mm).
customer_reviews.author: DEOKBAE PARK

customer_reviews.title: Wrong gender listed?
customer_reviews.text: Sure looks like this is listed as a Men's shoe but it's really a Women's?
customer_reviews.author: Mike Lawrence

product_meta.title: New Balance Women's 669v2 Cushioning Running Shoe
product_meta.description: Tackle new terrain in the 669v2. This New Balance women's trail walking shoe combines responsive cushioning with stability and style. The result: a durable travel companion ready to go off road.
feature_bullets: ABZORB cushioning foam plus a PU insert for comfort
